subtitle.translate: A versatile configurable system to move items / redstone / power / and fluids from one location to another though an existing ME Network without storage.

description: /b/ME P2P Tunnels/b/ are a versatile yet configurable system to move just about any types of matter from one location to another though your ME Network.
/6/Tunnels are 1 input to any number of outputs/6/. This means you can output to as many points as you want, but only input at a single point per tunnel.
It's worth noting however for /b/ME P2P Tunnels/b/ that you can only have /6/32 channels across all outputs/6/ and all used channels in though the input /6/must connect to your /b/ME Controller/b//6/

/b/ME P2P Tunnels/b/ take only one channel but much reach the other end(s) of the tunnel allowing for 32x32 channels on one dense cable however the channel required by a /b/ME P2P Tunnel/b/ cannot be carried through another tunnel.
To configure a/b/ ME P2P Tunnel/b/ you must first attune the tunnel to carry what you want it to, then you need to configure the outputs to their input.

You configure the connections by using the /b/Memory Card/b/; First /6/Shift+Right Click the input/6/ to save it on your memory card, then simply /6/right-click the different outputs/6/ to store the input onto the outputs.
